The Quranic researcher said to the Almighty: Those who if they are abandoned by people, they will be fulfilled, etc.A specific adjective for those who were descended from those who have come to the verse, or a description that is revealed to them, explaining to the way of the way of the way of their way.That is, if they take from people, they did not take the ruling of the purchase and the like, and they will take it, and they will be fulfilled, and the word “on” The seizure, or for the indication that it is a harmful note for people, not to adopt the war, from the condition that the condition of which is included, if it is in the meaning of the meaning, but the meaning of the matter in the meaning of the matter in the meaning of the matter, but the meaning is in the meaning of Building on the fact that what is meant by the severity does not take the right to sufficiently, but it is short, but the abundant passion is already.They do it with the clothing of the deposit and the drainage of the place to otherwise.It was said: That is to be admitted that their sins are because they have the right to the people, so it is a matter of the deceased that whoever follows them in this position, and it is said: I have said to him; That is: I took what I had to do, and I have been satisfied with it, and I was followed by it, and it was followed by that with it, it is necessary for it to be the same People are something with the way of purchase and the like with the fact that it is a good one between them, it requires that the meaning of the severity be taken to the people, and it is not from the one who is from the one who is from the one who is from the one When release in the exposure of the truth, it is not a path to their vigor and the supplication to them, and I carry what they have on them in the sense of what they will have for them.What does not find benefit; If I adopt the place of the deposit to them, whether it was or a fate that calls as the being of the severity in the meaning that is even ended.And I say: The cut of the view of the verse is descending in the descendants of their descriptions, taking the place of people if they fell asleep, and they will not want it, so they do not want to do so That the person is right or fate, and what is the one who is the one who is at the time of the severity, takes their money, and it is not possible for a Muslim, but it is not harmful, but it is not harmful.A way to vilify them and pray for them.We said: The path of defamation does not include the group of emotional people and the words as your saying: so that it takes its right from the people complete Delivery with it is more severe than the defamation with a grace that takes a deficiency and gives an incomplete, and it is without the defamation with the grace of your saying: He takes an excess and gives a minimum, and does not harm.Then it is said: The most in the manner of the person is a person as the one who is the one who is truly for him by his face from the faces, and perhaps the building of the words of the vast on that.It was permissible to be "on" related to the success of and be present on the verb to benefit the property; That is: they are satisfied with People are in particular, as they himself, they will fulfill it.It is followed by the fact that the minor is the validity of the neighbor and the boundaries, but it is where the verb can be attached to the other places, as well (P-69) By adapting it, it is short of it with the style of the heart, the individuals, or the awareness, according to the place.There is no doubt that the severity, which is a reflection of the sufficiency, is what is not perceived to be on themselves until it is intended to be able to present the neighbor and the neighbor of the neighbor and the one who is on the authority The hadith is located in the verb, not when it was ended.And he answered: What is meant by the exaggeration that is on that harm is that, as if it was said: If they are hurt, they will harm people in particular and do not harm themselves.And the palace with the style of the heart and the harm, which can be for themselves as they can be for people, and if the harm is different, it is different, if it is different, if it is different The deficiency and their harm to people by taking the increased, then if the dedication of what the action was signed is the path of defamation and supplication in the night, and with it it is answered in the place of the permit.I finish.And he does not hide what is in it.So he managed.
